scripts.dev: bun run --cwd apps/api dev & bun run --cwd apps/web dev
scripts.build: bun run --cwd apps/api build && bun run --cwd apps/web build
scripts.lint: bun run --cwd apps/api lint && bun run --cwd apps/web lint && bun run --cwd packages/validators lint
scripts.lint:fix: bun run --cwd apps/api lint:fix && bun run --cwd apps/web lint:fix
scripts.type-check: bun run --cwd apps/api type-check && bun run --cwd apps/web type-check && bun run --cwd packages/validators type-check
scripts.format: bun run --cwd apps/api format && bun run --cwd apps/web format
